meanings.definition: Trembling or shaking with a slight rapid motion.
meanings.sent1: The tiny puppy was quivering with excitement.
meanings.sent2: Her voice was quivering with fear as she spoke.
meanings.sent3: The quivering leaves on the tree seemed to be dancing in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The quivering flame of the candle cast eerie shadows on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The quivering ground beneath their feet made them feel unsteady.

meanings.definition: A slight trembling movement or sound.
meanings.sent1: The quivering of the leaves in the breeze was soothing to watch.
meanings.sent2: She heard a quivering in the bushes and wondered what creature was hiding there.
meanings.sent3: The quivering of the jello on the plate made it look like it was alive.
meanings.sent4: The quivering of the violin strings filled the room with beautiful music.
meanings.sent5: The quivering of the ground signaled an approaching earthquake.
